budget

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • budget.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a Client as the person or company whom the budget is created. The object is created from the data in the database or introduced in a form. The object contains basic information about the customer, who is the salesperson and provides methods to get an image using classes in the packages dao and storage.
    Author:
    oscar

      • Client

        public Client(int id,
              java.lang.String clientNumber,
              java.lang.String address,
              java.lang.String town,
              java.lang.String province,
              java.lang.String country,
              java.lang.String postalCode,
              java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String email,
              java.lang.String phone,
              java.lang.String person,
              java.lang.String notes,
              boolean isActive,
              Salesperson salesperson)
        Constructor to be used when showing client
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the client
        clientNumber - The fiscal number
        address - The Street, Number, etc
        town - The city
        province - The province
        country - The name of the country
        postalCode - The postal code (String)
        name - The name of the client
        email - The email
        phone - The phone (String)
        person - The name of the person of contact
        notes - A text where the salesperson can annotate about the client
        isActive - If isActive the client can have new budgets
        salesperson - The salesperson assigned to the client
